channel.title: To all the people with "Don't rep me I want 10 rep" in your signatures
channel.description:
Stop attention whoring yourself.
You're acting like whores and it's annoying when I see your signatures.
inb4 negtrain

item.title: To all the people with "Don't rep me I want 10 rep" in your signatures
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

drubrkletern:

Hurr i bet if i trolled hard enough, i could have -0 rep

or +ban.

item.title: To all the people with "Don't rep me I want 10 rep" in your signatures
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:76, topic:395254”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=492441.msg3602084#msg3602084 date=1305684141]
@Corey my stupidity normally doesn’t leave these forums, I be a complete moron on here because its funny to see how people react, off these forums I am completely different.
[/quote]

Which is why I said forum etiquette. I cannot judge someone I haven’t met in real life.[/quote]Well you can it would just be improper. Also I know that people rep for stupid reasons, but I remember when I did have 200 rep I would get PM’s asking how to do different things on servers, and all I ever did was make models o.o

Read full topic

It does actually provide some recognition, as recently some Guy said krackkid wasn’t to smart because he has 10 Rep… anyone remember that?
[/quote]Yeah people do actually look at rep before asking any questions. If someone has 200rep that means they are proprogrammers to some people. Even if they don’t know how to program.[/quote]

item.title: To all the people with "Don't rep me I want 10 rep" in your signatures
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Lol its good to see I am loved :3, also yes I keep everyone here chill for the most part, the troll squad that me, chaospkers, and Pure had going was the best, I mean I was got the least punishment from them all, I mean pure got banned, not to much later chaospkers got banned, I am still hanging on by the same thread as the day Pure was banned.

Am I proud of my status on the forums? Yes actually because everyone jumps to think I know nothing about these forums because of having 10 rep. Which is pretty damn awesome.

I honestly do not want the rep back, I mean its pretty funny looking at all the people who want 10 rep not getting it.

@Corey my stupidity normally doesn’t leave these forums, I be a complete moron on here because its funny to see how people react, off these forums I am completely different.

@ytuio I <3 you man XD

Read full topic
item.source: To all the people with "Don't rep me I want 10 rep" in your signatures

item.title: To all the people with "Don't rep me I want 10 rep" in your signatures
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“iCreatedHorror, post:63, topic:395254”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=492441.msg3602051#msg3602051 date=1305681932]

Why does it matter, really?

beCAUSE, if you have 10 rep like krackkid it will make you look cool. You obviously fail to understand the meaning of internet coolness and will henceforth be known as “uncoolpersoniCreatedHorror”
[/quote]
If that is what people on the internet want to call me, then so be it. It’s the internet.[/quote]
But I believe as we all know that the internet is serious business?

Read full topic

[/quote]
beCAUSE, if you have 10 rep like krackkid it will make you look cool. You obviously fail to understand the meaning of internet coolness and will henceforth be known as “uncoolpersoniCreatedHorror”[/quote]

LilXCj:

Krackkid keeps balance? In what, stupidity? No offense but I’ve notice quite a considerable increase stupidity involved in posts ever since people started following his forum etiquette.

I rest my case.

item.source: To all the people with "Don't rep me I want 10 rep" in your signatures

item.title: To all the people with "Don't rep me I want 10 rep" in your signatures
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:58, topic:395254”]Having 10 rep plus having it locked is supposed to be a punishment and is supposed to show that the person who has it deserves no respect at all. It doesn’t matter if “rep doesn’t matter”, it’s suppose to send that statement.

I have discovered that most people want 10 rep now because it is the new fashion. Apparently, people don’t want to abuse to get to 10, so they simply ask us to do it for them. This is a new fashion that has been started by non other than krackkid, so if we want someone to blame I say we ban krackkid.

No you stupid troll, that solves nothing.
Krackkid keeps a level of balance here, and without him, I’m sure a number of people would go on some form of strike, or it would be general chaos.

krackkid didn’t start a trend by any means… he was just being him. Casey abused at some point, and I just didn’t want to have that 200 rep status symbol where you get auto respect by new people just for a number. I simply always hated the fact that my reputability was represented by a number… I always believe it should be judged by other people in their posts and conversations instead of having a constant reference of it.

Think about it this way: You’re representend on the good side of the numbers.

Krackkid keeps balance? In what, stupidity? No offense but I’ve notice quite a considerable increase stupidity involved in posts ever since people started following his forum etiquette.[/quote]

But it isn’t a punishment any more, that is the problem with anything to deal with getting either a higher number, staying at a number, or getting a lower number, etc, etc, people will always take it way to far and try to create a fad out of it… Yet then they will say “oh rep means nothing, but look I have 10 rep I must be koolz”… Why can’t we keep things simple and remove rep… That way people can’t abuse it, try to make fads with it, use it to show ones intelligence, etc, etc…

[quote=“reyx7, post:59, topic:395254”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=492441.msg3602038#msg3602038 date=1305681335]
Having 10 rep plus having it locked is supposed to be a punishment and is supposed to show that the person who has it deserves no respect at all. It doesn’t matter if “rep doesn’t matter”, it’s suppose to send that statement.

I have discovered that most people want 10 rep now because it is the new fashion. Apparently, people don’t want to abuse to get to 10, so they simply ask us to do it for them. This is a new fashion that has been started by non other than krackkid, so if we want someone to blame I say we ban krackkid.

No you stupid troll, that solves nothing.
Krackkid keeps a level of balance here, and without him, I’m sure a number of people would go on some form of strike, or it would be general chaos.

krackkid didn’t start a trend by any means… he was just being him. Casey abused at some point, and I just didn’t want to have that 200 rep status symbol where you get auto respect by new people just for a number. I simply always hated the fact that my reputability was represented by a number… I always believe it should be judged by other people in their posts and conversations instead of having a constant reference of it.

Think about it this way: You’re representend on the good side of the numbers.

Krackkid keeps balance? In what, stupidity? No offense but I’ve notice quite a considerable increase stupidity involved in posts ever since people started following his forum etiquette.
[/quote]
Look, ok, not balance, but people would be pissed without him
How about instead of 10 rep, you give them somekind of red dot or something humiliating, like a badge that says “failure” with a picture of magikarp.[/quote]

Yeah give them a badge that says failure… Soon after that people will want to get the badge to become one of the “cool” people who have it…

Read full topic
item.source: To all the people with "Don't rep me I want 10 rep" in your signatures

Krackkid keeps balance? In what, stupidity? No offense but I’ve notice quite a considerable increase stupidity involved in posts ever since people started following his forum etiquette.[/quote]
